ygData.subject: Re: Gnome clock in Qeynos
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Someone on one of the eq stratics boards figured out what it said.. something like Qeynos Gnomes of Akanon over and over and over and over and over.. =)
ygData.messageBody:
>Has anybody bothered to do an analysis of the "Clock of Ak'Anon" in south
>qeynos? There are some runes on the surface of it that look like some of
>the runes that I've seen in Tolkien's books. I know Tolkien did a
>comprehensive language system using runes and such, but I'm not enough of a
>fantasy geek to actually know any of the specifics. Given that the clock
>is
>supposedly gnome built, it might have a tidbit of information on it. The
>fact that it's in plain sight would make it a prime target for a designer
>with a sense of humor too.


Someone on one of the eq stratics boards figured out what it said..

something like

Qeynos
Gnomes of Akanon

over and over and over and over and over.. =)

Catbik Tinkerton
